word: H7786 - שׂוּר - sûwr - soor - Make princes

sections.paragraph: வினைச்சொல் - ஆளுகை செய், துரைத்தனம் பண்ணு, அதிகாரியாயிரு, அரசாளு, வைத்துக்கொள்
to be or to act as prince, to rule, to contend, to have power, to prevail over
a) (Qal) to rule over, to govern
b) (Hiphil) to make rulers, to play the prince
ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: A primitive root; properly to vanquish; by implication to rule (causatively crown): - make princes, have power, reign. See H5493.
Cognate: H7786, H8269, H8282, H8283, H8297, H8323
